ValidationRule.description: To restrict Sub_type to the specified Profiles and display an Error message when anyone else attempts to submit
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration - SB")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Administration")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS Regional Sales Admin - SB")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Sales ZSA - SB")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS PEO Sales Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS Sales Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Manager - SB")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"NSS Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"PC Sales Manager - SB")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"NSS Manager")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Manager')), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, 'Contest Approval (Management Only)'), ISNEW() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contest Approval requests must be submitted by Management. Please work with your DSM or Zone Manager to have this request submitted.
